title: Track
emptyAlbum: This album appears to be empty.
findAlbumCopy: Enter an album or artist name
albumTimestampLogicDescription: Scrobbling tracks "now" will scrobble the last track at the current time, backdating the previous ones accordingly (as if you had just finished listening). The "custom timestamp" will define the timestamp of the first track and add time to the following tracks from there (i.e. you specify the time you started listening to this album)
findFriendCopy: Enter a last.fm username to see their last tracks
lastfmWillRejectOldTimestamps: Last.fm will reject scrobbles older than two weeks.
keepOriginalTimestamp: Scrobble using original date and time
songsWillAppearHere: Tracks will appear here once you scrobble them.
pasteIntercepted: The pasted text was automatically split!
considerDonating: Please support this project on Patreon!

footer.joinCommunity: You are welcome to join our community <1>on Discord</1>!
footer.specialThanks: Special thanks to all the donors, translators and <1>the contributors</1>

updates.newVersionAvailable: There's a new version available! Please <1>reload the page</1>

splitPastedText: Split text pasted in artists/title fields
purpose: This tool lets you scrobble songs and albums you heard on the radio, vinyl or at some place where you need to manually scrobble.
authNeeded: Authorize the application to get started!
logInIsSafe: This is safely done over at Last.fm

about.title: What is this?
about.description: An open source scrobbler for the web, which allows you to manually input songs and add them to your Last.fm profile.

support.title: Support this project
support.copy: Please consider becoming a patron to keep this site up and support development!

discord.title: Join us on Discord!
discord.copy: Stay connected with other music fans and find out when there's something new!

unexpectedErrorMessage: Your ad blocker may be blocking API calls to last.fm, try disabling it or adding an exception for ws.audioscrobbler.com
lastfmUnavailable: Last.fm isn't responding, please try again later.

loginError.title: Error logging in
loginError.message: There was an unexpected error logging in.

rateLimitMessage: Scrobbled too fast? Rate limit resets at midnight UTC (this limit is enforced by Last.fm)
slowDownMessage: You are scrobbling too fast. Please wait a moment and try again in a few minutes.
showTrackNumbers: Show track number in album lists
